column1: text
"The overwhelming amount of deaths resulting from smoking marijuana" (Quotation marks intentional)
A bag of oregano.
A bunch of Taco Bell employees smoking weed near the garbage cans.
A dealer who only exchanged weed for sex, no matter the gender.
A homeless man smoking a blunt while jacking off.
An ounce of that good shit.
Being too high and too groggy to penetrate your main girl.
Buying just one more grow light.
Curing retardation through smoking a joint.
Dudes.
Having the urge to go to Weinerschnitzel at 10pm.
How different your semen tastes after smoking weed.
Lallygagging on the couch like you just don't give a damn.
Magic brownies.
Marijuana.
My girlfriend Mary Jane.
Rolling a fatty for your pimp daddy.
Setting an entire field of weed on fire and causing an entire city to get high.
Smoking weed through your anus.
The convenience of getting a medical marijuana card by simply telling a doctor you have a blister.
The horror that ensues when you run out of breath mints before heading into work.
The legalization of marijuana in all 50 states.
This shiny new bong I picked up in San Francisco.
Turning a beer bottle into a bong.
Weed butter.
Your disgusted parents.
